actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs, and Office of Management and Budget.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require that there be at least one regional office of the Department of Veterans Affairs in each State within the United States.

summary.text: Requires that there be at least one regional office of the Department of Veterans Affairs in each State.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require that there be at least one regional office of the Department of Veterans Affairs in each State within the United States.
